title: Unicode Variable Names
shortDescription: Python 3 supports Unicode characters in variable names - you can use emojis and symbols!
detailedDescription: Python 3 added support for Unicode characters in identifiers, allowing you to use characters from different languages, mathematical symbols, and even emojis as variable names. While not recommended for production code, this feature adds flavor when working with scientific formulas or creating fun examples.
